Package org.chronos.chronodb.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Branch
    A Branch represents a single stream of changes in the versioning system.
    BranchHeadStatistics  
    BranchManager
    The BranchManager is responsible for managing the branching functionality inside a ChronoDB.
    ChangeSetEntry
    Represents a single entry in the set of changes made by a ChronoDBTransaction before committing.
    ChronoDB
    The top-level interface for interaction with a ChronoDB instance.
    ChronoDBFactory
    Acts as a singleton factory for instances of ChronoDB.
    ChronoDBStatistics  
    ChronoDBTransaction
    A ChronoDBTransaction encapsulates a set of queries and/or change operations on a ChronoDB.
    ChronoDBTransaction.Configuration
    This interface represents the configuration of a single transaction.
    IndexManager
    An IndexManager is a backend-agnostic facade for indexing in a ChronoDB.
    MaintenanceManager
    The MaintenanceManager offers maintenance operations on the database.
    SerializationManager
    The SerializationManager is responsible for conversion between Object and byte[] representation.
    StatisticsManager
    The StatisticsManager is the entry point to all statistic-related capabilities in the public API.
    TransactionSource
    A TransactionSource is an object capable of producing a variety of ChronoDBTransactions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChronoDBConstants
    A static collection of constants used throughout the ChronoDB API.
    DumpOption
    This class acts as a factory for options for ChronoDB.writeDump(java.io.File, DumpOption...).
    DumpOption.AliasOption
    An DumpOption.AliasOption allows to register alternative (usually shorter) names for classes that appear in a dump.
    DumpOption.DefaultConverterOption
    This option allows to add default ChronoConverters to a dump process.
    DumpOption.IntOption
    An DumpOption.IntOption is a named container for an integer value.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ChronoDBStatistics.HeadMinus  
    DuplicateVersionEliminationMode
    The mode in which duplicate versions are eliminated by ChronoDB.
    Order
    A general multi-purpose enumeration for any kind of ordering.
    PutOption
    Put options are advanced options that can be set per ChronoDBTransaction.put(String, Object, PutOption...) command.
